The Imperial Regalia of Japan - The Mirror Yata
Les 3 trésors impériaux : le miroir Yata
Die 3 Kaiserlichen Regalien, Yata-Spiegel
I 3 Sacri Tesori - Specchio di Yata
Los 3 tesoros imperiales: El espejo de Yata
三種の神器・八咫鏡（やたのかがみ）
삼종 신기, 야타의 거울
The Imperial Regalia of Japan - The Mirror Yata
三種神器：八咫鏡
三種神器：八咫鏡
The Imperial Regalia of Japan - The Mirror Yata
kDesc
Legend has it that this mirror was obtained from the Heavenly Rock Cave by the Sun Goddess Amaterasu.[#Legal]
Miroir qui a servi à faire sortir Amaterasu Oomikami de sa caverne céleste.[#Legal]
Spiegel, durch welchen Amaterasu Oomikami aus dem Felsentor des Himmels gelockt wurde.[#Legal]
Specchio che ha tirato fuori Amaterasu Omikami dal portone roccioso del regno dei cieli. [#Legal]
Espejo con el que se atrajo a la diosa del sol Amaterasu fuera de la cueva en la que estaba escondida.[#Legal]
アマテラスオオミカミを天の岩戸から引き出したとされる鏡。[#Legal]
아마테라스오오미카미를 아마노이와토에서 밖으로 끌어냈다고 하는 거울.[#Legal]
Legend has it that this mirrow was obtained from the Heavenly Rock Cave by the Sun Goddess Amaterasu.[#Legal]
據說是天照大神從岩洞中獲取的鏡。[#Legal]
據說是天照大神從岩洞中獲取的鏡。[#Legal]
Legend has it that this mirrow was obtained from the Heavenly Rock Cave by the Sun Goddess Amaterasu.[#Legal]
